data.name:
There once was a little witch 
who lived quietly, deep in the mountains.
data.name_processed:
<sc=32>There once was a little witch 
who lived quietly, deep in the mountains.

data.text:
But, she did not know what to use her magic for. 
"What is the purpose of my powers?" she wondered.
data.processed:
<story>But, she did not know what to use her magic for. 
<story>"What is the purpose of my powers?" she wondered.

data.text:
One night, under the dim moonlight, 
she read a picture book about the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>One night, under the dim moonlight, 
<story>she read a picture book about the outside world.

data.text:
The picture book showed people living happily 
in the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>The picture book showed people living happily 
<story>in the outside world.

data.text: "How nice. I wish I was like them."
data.processed: <story>"How nice. I wish I was like them."

data.text:
The little witch was moved and started to 
admire the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>The little witch was moved and started to 
<story>admire the outside world.

data.text:
She wondered if she could use her magic 
to make the outside world an even happier place.
data.processed:
<story>She wondered if she could use her magic 
<story>to make the outside world an even happier place.

data.text:
Before she knew it, it was already morning. 
The sunshine lit up the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>Before she knew it, it was already morning. 
<story>The sunshine lit up the outside world.

data.text:
Determined to make everyone happy, 
the little witch set foot into the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>Determined to make everyone happy, 
<story>the little witch set foot into the outside world.

data.text:
A few days have passed after Mejiro McQueen won 
the Spring Tenno Sho twice in a row――
data.processed:
<story>A few days have passed after Mejiro McQueen won 
<story>the Spring Tenno Sho twice in a row――

data.text: The training sessions of Team Sirius started to heat up.
data.processed: <story>The training sessions of Team Sirius started to heat up.

data.text: Whoo! Another new personal best!
data.name: 前髪ぱっつんのウマ娘
data.processed: <story>Whoo! Another new personal best!

data.text:
Heat turns into energy, and the members 
continue to improve their times.
data.processed:
<story>Heat turns into energy, and the members 
<story>continue to improve their times.

data.text: Everyone is in high spirits.
data.processed: <story>Everyone is in high spirits.

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: メジロマックイーン
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
During a practice run, Mejiro McQueen once again 
showed a dignified performance.
data.processed:
<story>During a practice run, Mejiro McQueen once again 
<story>showed a dignified performance.

data.text:
Yep, McQueen's awesome as always! Not dropping her pace 
nor form the entire time!
data.name: ゴールドシップ
data.processed:
<story>Yep, McQueen's awesome as always! Not dropping her pace 
<story>nor form the entire time!

data.text:
Surely there's no other Umamusume that can beat 
McQueen at long distances!
data.name: 前髪ぱっつんのウマ娘
data.processed:
<story>Surely there's no other Umamusume that can beat 
<story>McQueen at long distances!

data.text:
It's true, there probably aren't many Umamusume 
who could compete with her at long distances.
data.processed:
<story>It's true, there probably aren't many Umamusume 
<story>who could compete with her at long distances.

data.text: But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.
data.processed: <story>But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.

data.text: But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.
data.processed: <story>But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: ライスシャワー
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
Rice Shower. She only joined the team recently. 
She was unable to achieve the results she wanted.
data.processed:
<story>Rice Shower. She only joined the team recently. 
<story>She was unable to achieve the results she wanted.

data.text:
Oof. Rice is looking pretty beat. 
She's entirely out of breath.
data.name: ゴールドシップ
data.processed:
<story>Oof. Rice is looking pretty beat. 
<story>She's entirely out of breath.

data.text:
She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...
data.processed:
<story>She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
<story>Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...

data.text:
She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...
data.processed:
<story>She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
<story>Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...

data.text: She's looking at Mejiro McQueen's with a seriously sharp gaze.
data.processed: <story>She's looking at Mejiro McQueen's with a seriously sharp gaze.

data.text: She's holding on, no matter how tough it gets.
data.processed: <story>She's holding on, no matter how tough it gets.

data.text: And above all...
data.processed: <story>And above all...

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: メジロマックイーン
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
Almost... there...
Just a little more...
data.name: ライスシャワー
data.processed:
<story>Almost... there...
<story>Just a little more...

data.text:
You're still keeping up with me, huh?
However...
data.name: メジロマックイーン
data.processed:
<story>You're still keeping up with me, huh?
<story>However...

data.text: Ah!
data.name: ライスシャワー
data.processed: <story>Ah!

data.text: *pant pant*
data.name: メジロマックイーン
data.processed: <story>*pant pant*

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: ライスシャワー
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
Goaaal!
Another new personal best!
data.name: ゴールドシップ
data.processed:
<story>Goaaal!
<story>Another new personal best!

data.text: You're so awesome!
data.name: タレ目のウマ娘
data.processed: <story>You're so awesome!

data.text:
I wouldn't expect less from the 'Tenno Sho' Umamusume,
our ace! Right, Trainer?
data.name: 前髪ぱっつんのウマ娘
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't expect less from the 'Tenno Sho' Umamusume,
<story>our ace! Right, Trainer?

data.text: C-Could you stop the flattery, please?
data.name: メジロマックイーン
data.processed: <story>C-Could you stop the flattery, please?

data.text: And Rice, you did great too.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>And Rice, you did great too.

data.text: *huff* Eh? I did?
data.name: ライスシャワー
data.processed: <story>*huff* Eh? I did?

data.text: Pushing your limits like that, you showed some real guts.
data.name: ゴールドシップ
data.processed: <story>Pushing your limits like that, you showed some real guts.

data.text:
But... If I'm really that good at running, 
why can't I win any races...?
data.name: ライスシャワー
data.processed:
<story>But... If I'm really that good at running, 
<story>why can't I win any races...?

data.text:
I tried so hard for the Satsuki Sho, and the recent 
race too, but I only got 8th place...
data.name: ライスシャワー
data.processed:
<story>I tried so hard for the Satsuki Sho, and the recent 
<story>race too, but I only got 8th place...

data.text:
You say that, but you could probably beat McQueen with 
your fantastic last 50 meters. Don't sweat it!
data.name: ゴールドシップ
data.processed:
<story>You say that, but you could probably beat McQueen with 
<story>your fantastic last 50 meters. Don't sweat it!

data.text: Uh... But...
data.name: ライスシャワー
data.processed: <story>Uh... But...
